coqui-py
========

**coqui-py** provides a Python interface to the Coqui API, for easy integration of Coqui TTS services in Python codebases.

To get started, check out the :doc:`usage docs <usage>`.

Then, read the :doc:`API documentation <api>`.

   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:

   usage

   api
